Serialized Form

  • Package boofcv.abst.feature.describe

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.describe.ConfigBrief extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • radius

          int radius
          Region's radius. Typical value is 16.

        • numPoints

          int numPoints
          Number of points sampled. Typical value is 512.

        • blurSigma

          double blurSigma
          Amount of blur applied to the image before sampling. Typical value is -1

        • blurRadius

          int blurRadius
          Amount of blur applied to the image before sampling. Typical value is 4

        • fixed

          boolean fixed
          If true then a fixed sized descriptor is used. If false then orientation and scale information is used, if available. By default this is true.

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.describe.ConfigSiftDescribe extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • widthSubregion

          int widthSubregion
          widthSubregion Width of sub-region in samples. Try 4

        • widthGrid

          int widthGrid
          widthGrid Width of grid in subregions. Try 4.

        • numHistogramBins

          int numHistogramBins
          numHistogramBins Number of bins in histogram. Try 8

        • sigmaToPixels

          double sigmaToPixels
          sigmaToPixels Conversion of sigma to pixels. Used to scale the descriptor region. Try 1.0

        • weightingSigmaFraction

          double weightingSigmaFraction
          weightingSigmaFraction Sigma for Gaussian weighting function is set to this value * region width. Try 0.5

        • maxDescriptorElementValue

          double maxDescriptorElementValue
          maxDescriptorElementValue Helps with non-affine changes in lighting. See paper. Try 0.2

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.describe.ConfigSiftScaleSpace extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • sigma0

          float sigma0
          Amount of blur at the first level in the image pyramid. Recommend 1.6

        • numScales

          int numScales
          Number of scales in each octave. The amount of Gaussian blur will double this number of images in the octave. However, the number of actual images computed will be numScales + 3 and the number of difference of Guassian images will be numScales + 2.

        • firstOctave

          int firstOctave
          Specified the first and last octaves. Each octave is a factor of 2 smaller or larger than the input image. The overall size of an octave relative to the input image is pow(2,-octave)

        • lastOctave

          int lastOctave
          Specified the first and last octaves. Each octave is a factor of 2 smaller or larger than the input image. The overall size of an octave relative to the input image is pow(2,-octave)

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.describe.ConfigSurfDescribe extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • widthLargeGrid

          int widthLargeGrid
          Number of sub-regions wide the large grid is. Typically 4

        • widthSubRegion

          int widthSubRegion
          Number of sample points wide a sub-region is. Typically 5

        • widthSample

          int widthSample
          The width of a sample point. Typically 3

        • useHaar

          boolean useHaar
          If true the Haar wavelet will be used. If false means image gradient.

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.describe.ConfigSurfDescribe.Speed extends ConfigSurfDescribe implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • weightSigma

          double weightSigma
          Weighting factor's sigma. Try 3.8

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.describe.ConfigSurfDescribe.Stability extends ConfigSurfDescribe implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • overLap

          int overLap
          Number of sample points sub-regions overlap, Typically 2.

        • sigmaLargeGrid

          double sigmaLargeGrid
          Sigma used to weight points in the sub-region grid. Typically 2.5

        • sigmaSubRegion

          double sigmaSubRegion
          Sigma used to weight points in the large grid. Typically 2.5

  • Package boofcv.abst.feature.detdesc

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.detdesc.ConfigCompleteSift extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • scaleSpace

          ConfigSiftScaleSpace scaleSpace

  • Package boofcv.abst.feature.detect.extract

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.detect.extract.ConfigExtract extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • radius

          int radius
          Search radius of the non-maximum region. Most common value is 1 for a 3x3 region. Default is 1.

        • threshold

          float threshold
          Minimum feature intensity it will consider when detecting a maximum. For local minimums it will use a value of -threshold. Defaults to 0.

        • ignoreBorder

          int ignoreBorder
          Size of border around the image in which pixels are not considered. Default is 0.

        • useStrictRule

          boolean useStrictRule
          Is a strict test used to test for local maximums. If strict the local maximum must be greater than all its neighbors, otherwise it just needs to be greater than or equal to its neighbors. Default is true.

        • detectMinimums

          boolean detectMinimums
          If false then local maximums will be found

        • detectMaximums

          boolean detectMaximums
          If true then local maximums will be found

  • Package boofcv.abst.feature.detect.interest

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.detect.interest.ConfigFast extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • pixelTol

          int pixelTol
          How different pixels need to be to be considered part of a corner. Image dependent. Try 20 to start.

        • minContinuous

          int minContinuous
          Minimum number of pixels around the circle that are required to be a corner. Can be 9 to 12

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.detect.interest.ConfigFastHessian extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • detectThreshold

          float detectThreshold
          Minimum feature intensity. Image dependent. Start tuning at 1.

        • extractRadius

          int extractRadius
          Radius used for non-max-suppression. Typically 1 or 2.

        • maxFeaturesPerScale

          int maxFeaturesPerScale
          Maximum number of features that non-maximum suppression (NMS) can return from each scale. Features with higher intensity scores are given preference. If ≤ 0 NMS will return all features it finds.

        • initialSampleSize

          int initialSampleSize
          How often pixels are sampled in the first octave. Typically 1 or 2.

        • initialSize

          int initialSize
          Typically 9.

        • numberScalesPerOctave

          int numberScalesPerOctave
          Typically 4.

        • numberOfOctaves

          int numberOfOctaves
          Typically 4.

        • scaleStepSize

          int scaleStepSize
          Increment between kernel sizes as it goes up in scale. In some data sets, increasing this value beyound the default value results in an improvement in stability. Default 6

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.detect.interest.ConfigGeneralDetector extends ConfigExtract implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • maxFeatures

          int maxFeatures
          Specifies the maximum number of features it will detect. If a value is specified then the 'maxFeature' most intense features are returned. Set to a value ≤ 0 to return all selected features. Default is -1.

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.detect.interest.ConfigSiftDetector extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • extract

          ConfigExtract extract
          Configures non-maximum feature detector across the image

        • maxFeaturesPerScale

          int maxFeaturesPerScale
          The maximum number of features it can detect in a single space

        • edgeR

          double edgeR
          Threshold used to remove edge responses. Larger values means its less strict. Try 10

  • Package boofcv.abst.feature.orientation

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.orientation.ConfigAverageIntegral extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • objectRadiusToScale

          double objectRadiusToScale
          How to convert the radius to the internal canonical scale. Can be used to adjust how big or small the region is.

        • radius

          int radius
          Radius of the region being considered in terms of samples. Typically 6.

        • samplePeriod

          double samplePeriod
          How often the image is sampled. This number is scaled. Typically 1.

        • sampleWidth

          int sampleWidth
          How wide of a kernel should be used to sample. Try 6

        • weightSigma

          double weightSigma
          Sigma for weighting. zero for unweighted. less than zero for automatic. Try -1.

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.orientation.ConfigSiftOrientation extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • histogramSize

          int histogramSize
          Number of elements in the histogram. Standard is 36

        • sigmaEnlarge

          double sigmaEnlarge
          How much the scale is enlarged by. Standard is 2.0

    • Class boofcv.abst.feature.orientation.ConfigSlidingIntegral extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • objectRadiusToScale

          double objectRadiusToScale
          How to convert the radius to the internal canonical scale. Can be used to adjust how big or small the region is.

        • samplePeriod

          double samplePeriod
          How often the image is sampled. This number is scaled. Typically 0.65.

        • windowSize

          double windowSize
          Angular window that is slide across. Try PI/3

        • radius

          int radius
          Radius of the region being considered in terms of samples. Typically 8.

        • weightSigma

          double weightSigma
          Sigma for weighting distribution. 0 for unweighted. less than zero for automatic. Try -1

        • sampleWidth

          int sampleWidth
          Size of kernel doing the sampling. Typically 6.

  • Package boofcv.alg.feature.detect.line.gridline

      • Serialized Fields

        • theta

          float theta

  • Package boofcv.alg.flow

    • Class boofcv.alg.flow.ConfigBroxWarping extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • alpha

          float alpha
          Brightness difference weighting factor. Larger values which prefer a smooth flow.

        • gamma

          float gamma
          Gradient difference weighting factor. Larger values which prefer a smooth flow.

        • SOR_RELAXATION

          float SOR_RELAXATION
          SOR relaxation parameter. 0 < w < 2. Recommended default is 1.9

        • numOuter

          int numOuter
          Number of iterations in the outer loop

        • numInner

          int numInner
          Number of iterations in the inner loop

        • maxIterationsSor

          int maxIterationsSor
          Maximum allowed iterations for SOR

        • convergeToleranceSor

          float convergeToleranceSor
          Convergence tolerance for SOR loop. Specified in per pixel error.

        • pyrScale

          double pyrScale
          Change in scale between each layer. Try 0.75

        • pyrSigma

          double pyrSigma
          Amount of gaussian blur applied to each layer in the pyramid. If sigma ≤ 0 then no blur is applied.

        • pyrMaxLayers

          int pyrMaxLayers
          Maximum number of layers in the pyramid

        • interpolation

          boofcv.alg.interpolate.InterpolationType interpolation
          Type of interpolation used. Bilinear recommended

  • Package boofcv.alg.tracker.combined

    • Class boofcv.alg.tracker.combined.CombinedTrack extends georegression.struct.point.Point2D_F64 implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • track

          PyramidKltFeature track

        • desc

          TupleDesc<T extends TupleDesc> desc

        • featureId

          long featureId

        • cookie

          java.lang.Object cookie

  • Package boofcv.factory.background

    • Class boofcv.factory.background.ConfigBackgroundBasic extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • learnRate

          float learnRate
          Specifies how fast it will adapt to changes in the background. From 0 to 1, inclusive. 0 = static 1.0 = instant.

        • threshold

          float threshold
          Threshold for classifying a pixel as background or not. If euclidean distance less than or equal to this value it is background.

        • interpolation

          boofcv.alg.interpolate.InterpolationType interpolation
          Specifies which interpolation it will use. InterpolationType.BILINEAR or InterpolationType.NEAREST_NEIGHBOR recommended.

          ONLY USED FOR MOVING BACKGROUNDS!

    • Class boofcv.factory.background.ConfigBackgroundGaussian extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • learnRate

          float learnRate
          Specifies how fast it will adapt to changes in the background. From 0 to 1, inclusive. 0 = static 1.0 = instant.

        • threshold

          float threshold
          Threshold for classifying a pixel as background or not. This threshold is applied to the computed Mahalanobis from the distribution. An appropriate threshold will vary depending on the number of bands in the image.

        • initialVariance

          float initialVariance
          The initial variance assigned to a new pixel. Larger values to reduce false positives due to under sampling. Don't set to zero since that can cause divided by zero errors.

        • minimumDifference

          float minimumDifference
          Minimum Euclidean distance between the mean background and observed pixel value for it to be considered moving. This value is automatically scaled for the number of bands in the image.

        • interpolation

          boofcv.alg.interpolate.InterpolationType interpolation
          Specifies which interpolation it will use. InterpolationType.BILINEAR or InterpolationType.NEAREST_NEIGHBOR recommended.

          ONLY USED FOR MOVING BACKGROUNDS!

  • Package boofcv.factory.feature.dense

    • Class boofcv.factory.feature.dense.ConfigDenseHoG extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • orientationBins

          int orientationBins
          Number of orientation bins.

        • pixelsPerCell

          int pixelsPerCell
          Number of pixels in a cell.

        • cellsPerBlockX

          int cellsPerBlockX
          Number of cells wide a block is along x-axis

        • cellsPerBlockY

          int cellsPerBlockY
          Number of cells wide a block is along x-axis

        • stepBlock

          int stepBlock
          Number of cells that are skipped between two blocks.

        • fastVariant

          boolean fastVariant
          If set to true a faster variant of HOG will be used which doesn't apply spatial normalization. Set to false to replicate the version of HOG proposed in the original paper.

    • Class boofcv.factory.feature.dense.ConfigDenseSift extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • sift

          ConfigSiftDescribe sift
          Specifies how the SIFT descriptor is computed. All parameters are used but ConfigSiftDescribe.sigmaToPixels

        • sampling

          DenseSampling sampling
          Specifies the frequency it will sample across the image in pixels. Default ix period X = 6, period Y = 6.

    • Class boofcv.factory.feature.dense.ConfigDenseSurfFast extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • surf

          ConfigSurfDescribe.Speed surf
          Configuration for Stable SURF descriptor

        • sampling

          DenseSampling sampling
          Specifies the frequency it will sample across the image in pixels. Default ix period X = 8, period Y = 8.

        • descriptorScale

          double descriptorScale
          Relative size of descriptor

    • Class boofcv.factory.feature.dense.ConfigDenseSurfStable extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • surf

          ConfigSurfDescribe.Stability surf
          Configuration for Stable SURF descriptor

        • sampling

          Specifies the frequency it will sample across the image in pixels. Default ix period X = 8, period Y = 8.

        • descriptorScale

          double descriptorScale
          Relative size of descriptor

  • Package boofcv.factory.feature.detect.line

    • Class boofcv.factory.feature.detect.line.ConfigHoughFoot extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • localMaxRadius

          int localMaxRadius
          Lines in transform space must be a local max in a region with this radius. Try 5;

        • minCounts

          int minCounts
          Minimum number of counts/votes inside the transformed image. Try 5.

        • minDistanceFromOrigin

          int minDistanceFromOrigin
          Lines which are this close to the origin of the transformed image are ignored. Try 5.

        • thresholdEdge

          float thresholdEdge
          Threshold for classifying pixels as edge or not. Try 30.

        • maxLines

          int maxLines
          Maximum number of lines to return. If ≤ 0 it will return them all.

    • Class boofcv.factory.feature.detect.line.ConfigHoughFootSubimage extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • localMaxRadius

          int localMaxRadius
          Lines in transform space must be a local max in a region with this radius. Try 5;

        • minCounts

          int minCounts
          Minimum number of counts/votes inside the transformed image. Try 5.

        • minDistanceFromOrigin

          int minDistanceFromOrigin
          Lines which are this close to the origin of the transformed image are ignored. Try 5.

        • thresholdEdge

          float thresholdEdge
          Threshold for classifying pixels as edge or not. Try 30.

        • maxLines

          int maxLines
          Maximum number of lines to return. If ≤ 0 it will return them all.

        • totalHorizontalDivisions

          int totalHorizontalDivisions
          Number of sub-images in horizontal direction Try 2

        • totalVerticalDivisions

          int totalVerticalDivisions
          Number of sub images in vertical direction. Try 2

    • Class boofcv.factory.feature.detect.line.ConfigHoughPolar extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • localMaxRadius

          int localMaxRadius
          Radius for local maximum suppression. Try 2.

        • minCounts

          int minCounts
          Minimum number of counts for detected line. Critical tuning parameter and image dependent.

        • resolutionRange

          double resolutionRange
          Resolution of line range in pixels. Try 2

        • resolutionAngle

          double resolutionAngle
          Resolution of line angle in radius. Try PI/180

        • thresholdEdge

          float thresholdEdge
          Edge detection threshold. Try 50.

        • maxLines

          int maxLines
          Maximum number of lines to return. If ≤ 0 it will return all

  • Package boofcv.factory.flow

    • Class boofcv.factory.flow.ConfigHornSchunck extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • alpha

          float alpha
          Larger values place more importance on flow smoothness consistency over brightness consistency. Try 20

        • numIterations

          int numIterations
          Number of iterations. Try 1000

    • Class boofcv.factory.flow.ConfigHornSchunckPyramid extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • alpha

          float alpha
          Weights importance of image brightness error and velocity smoothness. Larger values which prefer a smooth flow.

        • SOR_RELAXATION

          float SOR_RELAXATION
          SOR relaxation parameter.

        • numWarps

          int numWarps
          Number of warps which it will apply.

        • maxInnerIterations

          int maxInnerIterations
          Maximum number of iterations in the inner loop.

        • convergeTolerance

          float convergeTolerance
          Convergence tolerance for inner loop. Specified in per pixel error.

        • pyrScale

          double pyrScale
          Change in scale between each layer. Try 0.7

        • pyrSigma

          double pyrSigma
          Amount of blur applied to each layer in the pyramid. If sigma ≤ 0 then no blur is applied.

        • pyrMaxLayers

          int pyrMaxLayers
          Maximum number of layers in the pyramid

        • interpolation

          boofcv.alg.interpolate.InterpolationType interpolation
          Type of interpolation used. Bilinear recommended

  • Package boofcv.factory.shape

    • Class boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigEllipseDetector extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • maxDistanceFromEllipse

          double maxDistanceFromEllipse
          Detector: maximum distance from the ellipse in pixels

        • minimumContour

          int minimumContour
          Detector: minimum number of pixels in the contour

        • maximumContour

          int maximumContour
          Detector: maximum number of pixels in the contour. 0 == no limit

        • processInternal

          boolean processInternal
          Detector: If true it will consider internal contours and not just external

        • maxIterations

          int maxIterations
          Refinement: maximum number of refinement iterations it will performance. Set to zero to disable

        • convergenceTol

          double convergenceTol
          Refinement: when the difference between two ellipses is less than this amount stop iterating

        • numSampleContour

          int numSampleContour
          Refinement: how many points along the contour it will sample. Set to ≤ 0 to disable refinement

        • refineRadialSamples

          int refineRadialSamples
          Refinement:
          Determines the number of points sampled radially outwards from the line Total intensity values sampled at each point along the line is radius*2+2, and points added to line fitting is radius*2+1.

        • minimumEdgeIntensity

          double minimumEdgeIntensity
          Check:
          Threshold for minimum edge intensity. This should be a value which is 0 to (max-min pixel value) Set to ≤ 0 to disable check.

        • checkRadialDistance

          double checkRadialDistance
          Check:
          Tangential distance away from contour the image is sampled when performing edge intensity check.

        • maxMajorToMinorRatio

          double maxMajorToMinorRatio
          The maximum ratio between the major to minor ratio

    • Class boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigPolygonDetector extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • minimumSides

          int minimumSides
          Minimum number of sides

        • maximumSides

          int maximumSides
          Maximum number of sides

        • canTouchBorder

          boolean canTouchBorder
          If false then polygons which touch the image border are pruned

        • contour2Poly_splitFraction

          double contour2Poly_splitFraction
          A line is split if a point along the contour between the two end points has a distance from the line which is greater than this fraction of the line's length

        • contour2Poly_iterations

          int contour2Poly_iterations
          Number of split and merge iterations when converting contour into polygon

        • contour2Poly_minimumSideFraction

          double contour2Poly_minimumSideFraction
          The minimum allowed length of a side as a fraction of the total contour length

        • splitPenalty

          double splitPenalty
          Magic number used to penalize a polygon when a new corner is added
          See Also:
          MinimizeEnergyPrune

        • minimumEdgeIntensity

          double minimumEdgeIntensity

          The minimum allowed edge intensity for a shape. Used to remove false positives generated by noise, which is especially common when using a local threshold during binarization.

          Set to zero to disable.

          See Also:
          EdgeIntensityPolygon

        • minContourImageWidthFraction

          double minContourImageWidthFraction
          Specifies the minimum allowed contour length as a fraction of the input image's width. Smaller numbers mean smaller objects are allowed.

        • clockwise

          boolean clockwise
          Will the found polygons be in clockwise order?

        • convex

          boolean convex
          Does it require that the found polygons be convex?

        • refine

          boofcv.struct.Configuration refine
          Configuration for sub-pixel refinement of line. If null then this step is skipped. Defaults to a line refinement algorithm.
          See Also:
          ConfigRefinePolygonLineToImage, ConfigRefinePolygonCornersToImage

    • Class boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigRefinePolygonCornersToImage extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • endPointDistance

          int endPointDistance
          How many indexes away in the contour list should end points be.

        • cornerOffset

          double cornerOffset
          How far away in pixels it will start sampling the line from a corner. Corners can become highly aliased with ambiguous borders. Sides with smaller acute angles will be aliased to a greater distance and you might need to increase this number.

        • lineSamples

          int lineSamples
          Number of times along the line it will be sampled

        • sampleRadius

          int sampleRadius
          Number of points tangent to the line in each direction it samples. In total the number of samples along a line will be lineSamples*(2*sampleRadius+1)

        • maxIterations

          int maxIterations
          Maximum number of iterations

        • convergeTolPixels

          double convergeTolPixels
          Convergence tolerance in pixels

        • maxCornerChangePixel

          double maxCornerChangePixel
          Maximum number of pixels a corner can be adjusted in a single iteration. This becomes important with very small shapes and can prevent divergence.

    • Class boofcv.factory.shape.ConfigRefinePolygonLineToImage extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • cornerOffset

          double cornerOffset
          How far away in pixels it will start sampling the line from a corner. Corners can become highly aliased with ambiguous borders.

        • lineSamples

          int lineSamples
          Number of times along the line it will be sampled

        • sampleRadius

          int sampleRadius
          Number of points tangent to the line in each direction it samples. In total the number of samples along a line will be lineSamples*(2*sampleRadius+1)

        • maxIterations

          int maxIterations
          Maximum number of iterations

        • convergeTolPixels

          double convergeTolPixels
          Convergence tolerance in pixels

        • maxCornerChangePixel

          double maxCornerChangePixel
          Maximum number of pixels a corner can be adjusted in a single iteration. This becomes important with very small shapes and can prevent divergence.
